days.text: Fine apart from cloudy periods. Mist at first. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
